Typo -
> Before
> POST mailbox://hotmail.com/asynch_messaging/INBOX/

> POST mailbox://hotmail.com/asynch_messaging/INBOX/

It'd be interesting to also use HTTP to GET and POST content of
Content-Type: message/http-request
You could do asynchronous, client-initiated HTTP.
